metadata.title: CVE-2018-20723 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability exists in color_templates.php in Cacti before 1.2.0 due to lack of escaping of unintended characters in the Name field for a Color.

criterions.comment: cacti package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.2.16+ds1-2ubuntu1').
